searchScreen.title: Search
searchScreen.noSelection: Select a pokèmon from the list below.

evolutionsScreen.title: Evolutions
evolutionsScreen.noEvolutions: %{species} does not evolve. Use the icon buttons in the header above to update your pokèmon selection.

encountersScreen.title: Encounters
encountersScreen.noEncounters: %{species} has no encounters in %{version}. Use the icon buttons in the header above to update your pokèmon selection or choose a different game version to filter on.
encountersScreen.noFilter: Use the button above to select a game version to filter by.

filterScreen.title: Filter
filterScreen.noFilter: Select a game version to filter encounters on from the list below.

errorScreen.title: Something went wrong!
errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: This is the screen that your users will see in production when an error is thrown. You'll want to customize this message (located in `app/i18n/en.json`) and probably the layout as well (`app/screens/error`). If you want to remove this entirely, check `app/app.tsx` for the <ErrorBoundary> component.
